Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Space Laboratories releases it's first Marine Division Craft - "Jet Boat"

Instruction Manual for "Mr. JB - Jet Boat"

Launch and move to lawn with Craft Carrier power only

Bring Carrier with the Craft to 20m/s

Hit Time Warp once to speed things up, when craft slows repeat until you near the shoreline

At the slope near the shoreline keep between 10 and 15m/s entering the water under 10m/s

Ignite Engines and bring to about 8m/s then release the cart and this should keep the carrier wheels from getting stuck under the craft and not causing damage to Mr. JB

Give it Full Throttle at this point and have fun!

Craft File Here

https://files.secureserver.net/0sY18qIeZTsh2g
